review: My shaking is well controlled but I don't like the side effects I have. I am positive the problems are drug related. I have facial pain, like a sinus pain, nasal burning, occasional headaches, lips and mouth tingle.  I no longer have orgasms.  I have low blood pressure so I couldn't take certain other medications.  A couple others make me very nauseous. I decided to live with the side effects of zonisamide for now.

Zonegran (zonisamide):No help! My hand and head still shake. I have a headache, nausea, and vomiting II never had. My face is red. I have no energy and have to push myself to do things. This is not me!
Zonegran (zonisamide):Since I've started taking Zonegran I have not had ANY flare ups of tremors in my hands. No bad side effects however, one good one... It has helped me lose weight!
